# Noggn: AI Therapy App

> Noggn is a personalized AI therapist that helps you "unbrainrot yourself" with empathetic conversation and self-reflection.

**Overview**  
Noggn offers AI-powered voice or text coaching, seamlessly guiding people through mental clarity and emotional resilience.

## Core Links
- [Homepage](https://noggn.app/): Your main gateway to Noggn’s web presence.
- [App Store – Noggn AI](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/noggn-ai/id6747649185): Official iOS app listing for download and details.
